main event: On October 21, 1966, a civilian witness observed a UFO in Pataskala, Ohio for approximately 35 minutes.
interesting points: The object could stop in mid-air and hover frequently,The object made 90-degree turns at high speed without skidding,The witness felt a strange yet primitive feeling, suggesting the object was not harmful,Two additional headlights were observed shining from the bottom of the object,The witness stated that the object fluctuated in distance, sometimes appearing as close as 1 mile away.
witness description: a 19-year-old female very familiar with various aircraft.
